Re: Agency is a brand building agency with offices in London and New York.

About Re: Agency
Re: Agency is a dynamic brand building agency with offices in London and New York. We pride ourselves on collaborating with founders who align with our ethos – we don’t have a “type” of client – we have a type of founder or team that we want to work with. We love to work with start-ups and are especially proud of those we have incubated and worked with from their inception. Many of these are now globally recognized names and players across tech, hospitality, lifestyle, travel, luxury and finance. Creative ideas are at the heart of everything we do, working with press, influencers, brand partners and beyond to create strategies that are tailor-made and thoughtfully executed for each individual client. At Re: Agency, no day is ever the same

Job Description

Client Management

● Manage the day-to-day client teams and accounts and be a point of contact for clients
● Manage and implement client PR and communications strategy in conjunction with the wider account teams
● Host clients and our external agency network for meetings, events and activations
● Organize and lead activations, trips and strategy development
● Input and oversee all monthly and weekly reporting

Creative Strategy

● Creatively strategize an activity plan of pitches, trips, activations, and partnerships that reflect specific client brand messaging and increase awareness
● Provide insight into new tastemakers and brands and suggest creative ideas based on account strategies
● Undertake regular competitor analysis and provide development ideas and innovative suggestions
● Continue to build a growing network of contacts within the industry and beyond

Team Leadership

● Oversee team members and work closely within the wider Re: Agency team on overall account management and strategies
● Manage budgets and provide regular financial and strategic updates

Experience & Skills
● Minimum of four years agency experience working across travel and interiors clients
● Strong skills in communication (both written and oral), research, and organization
● Experience in managing a team and overseeing staff development
● Excellent media and industry contacts across travel and lifestyle media (on and off-line)|
● Competency in using and leveraging social media platforms and content within wider PR strategies
● Has established industry contacts and relationships in London and New York City (and beyond)
● Proven track record of successfully managing campaigns for clients in a variety of industries
● Meticulous organizational skills and attention to detail
● Adaptable to a fast-paced, multi-task environment
● Efficient problem-solver
● Must be positive, able to work under pressure and willing to learn

An Ideal Candidate
Our most successful team members are those who are creative, outside of the box thinkers, who are experts in spinning plates, have their finger on the pulse and thrive in social interaction / making new connections. Communications is entering a new phase and we aim to innovate, we are looking for future-thinkers. The ideal candidate will:
● Be dialed in on the most current, culturally important people, events, brands and more – focused to both the UK and US markets
● Possesses exceptional industry contacts and relationships in London and New York City (and beyond)
● Demonstrate high level execution skills and meticulous attention to detail, both aesthetically and organizationally
● Be adaptable to a fast-paced, multi-tasking environment
● Have confidence to make suggestions and bring ideas to the wider team
● Have enthusiasm and motivation to attend industry events
● Possess strong skills in communication (both written and oral) and research
● Have a willingness to work outside of normal business hours and occasional weekends for promotional activities, conferences, events and activations

Details:
● Job Type: Full-time, Contract
● Schedule: Monday-Friday
● Location: In-person

Benefits:
● Competitive PTO package
● 401(k) retirement plan with company contributions

For more information, visit: https://www.re-agency.com/careers / @the_re_agency
